mapper.insert: insert into t_teacher (id, name, age, height, birth, sex) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{height,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update t_teacher set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, height = #{height,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, birth = #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, age, height, birth, sex from t_teacher
